messages.title: Local Resident and Public Servant
messages.content: Bob was in the British Army - receiving a Military MBE - prior to becoming the Island's MP. He served in Afghanistan and Iraq, returning to the Island between tours. Bob was twice elected as an IOW councillor. He lives near Brighstone.

messages.title: Championing the Isle of Wight in Westminster
messages.content: Bob is a passionate advocate for our Island - and he gets results. Working with others, he has secured £48m for the NHS and £26m for Island Line. Sandown School and Ventnor Quays have been saved. Bob will continue to deliver for the Island.

messages.title: Protecting Our Island & Housing for Islanders
messages.content: As an Islander, Bob has campaigned to improve the Island Plan. He is working with the Council to protect green fields, reduce housing targets & prioritize homes for local families. He will push for greater environmental protections for the Island.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect green fields and prioritize homes for local families.
Push for greater environmental protections for the Island.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Corbyn propped up by parties like the Scottish Nationalists.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.

issues.education: English schools to get three-year £14bn funding boost.
issues.environment: Push for greater environmental protections for the Island.
issues.lawCrime: End of the soft prison sentence.
